In England, in the seven days to 25 November, there were 249,006 new confirmed cases (440.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 November, there were 238,959 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% (10,047 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 November is 8,673,344 (15,337.4 cases per 100,000 population).
